programme.title: Live PGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: The Memorial Tournament. Coverage of the fourth and final day at the Muirfield Village Country Club in Dublin, Ohio. Jason Dufner triumphed at this tournament last year when he finished three strokes clear of Rickie Fowler and Anirban Lahiri, earning him a fifth PGA Tour victory of his career, while Greg Norman was selected as the honoree player in what is an annual tradition at this event.

programme.sub-title: England v Pakistan: Second Test Day Four
programme.desc: England v Pakistan. Coverage of the fourth day of the Second and final Test in the series, which takes place at Headingley. England captain Joe Root and wicketkeeper Jonny Bairstow will be in familiar surroundings for this contest at the ground of their home county, and Root in particular will hope to perform at least as well as he did against the West Indies here last year, when he recorded scores of 59 and 72 respectively.

The eighth day's play in the French Open at Roland Garros, featuring fourth-round singles matches in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. This was a day to forget for some of the leading women in the sport last year, with defending champion Garbine Muguruza losing in three sets to Kristina Mladenovic, and former winners Svetlana Kuznetsova, Venus Williams and Samantha Stosur also exiting the tournament.(n)

Europa League: Magazin
programme.desc: Po letih vladavine Seville so pred letom dni v Evropski ligi slavili nogometaši Manchester Uniteda, ki so si s tem priigrali tudi nastop v Ligi prvakov. Kdo bo rdeče vrage nasledil na prestolu? Vse zanimivosti o drugem najelitnejšem evropskem klubskem tekmovanju izveste v magazinu.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Magazin
programme.desc: Branilec naslova najmočnejšega klubskega nogometnega tekmovanja v Evropi je madridski Real, ki je z zmago proti Juventusu kot prvi ubranil naslov prvaka v najelitnejšem evropskem klubskem tekmovanju. Kdo pa bo Ligo prvakov osvojil v novi sezoni? Vse zanimivosti o najelitnejšem evropskem klubskem tekmovanju izveste v tedenskem magazinu.

programme.title: La Liga: La Liga best goals 2017-2018

programme.title: Live! Zlata liga (m): Slovenija - Ukrajina
programme.desc: Nekoliko spremenjena in predvsem pomlajena slovenska odbojkarska vrsta nadaljuje z nastopi v Zlati ligi. Izbranci Sama Miklavca se bodo tokrat znova predstavili pred svojimi navijači, ko gostijo Ukrajino. Bodo imeli dovolj znanja, da pridejo do zmage?

programme.title: Kvalifikacije za EP 2018 (ž): Češka - Slovenija
